name: 3D RC Car Parking - eXtreme Stunt Cars Driving & Roof Jumping Simulator
name_original: 3D RC Car Parking - eXtreme Stunt Cars Driving & Roof Jumping Simulator
description:
Wow..get ready to take control of an RC stunt car as you drive around a room full of items such as rulers, matches, dominos, etc... are not only hazardous.. but they are H U G E! You'll have to be careful as you navigate this amazing world... If you're a fan of parking games, you will absolutely love this one. It's the craziest RC car game you will have ever played!

FEATURES

- All RC cars & trucks unlocked.
- Incredible world where you are shrunken down to a tiny micro car!
- Realistic graphics.
- 10 levels to master.
- Easy controls.

Take a look around, explore this fun world, and drive your RC stunt car around and find your parking spot to park your car or truck!
